channel.title: -317- Dupers -317-
channel.description:
Hey there.
I need help because theres over 100 people on my server that have duped items, my character folder is full of accounts and i Cba looking through all of them.
I need a .bat file which deletes all the items the person has in the bank and what they are wearing, if you have it please post it here.

item.title: -317- Dupers -317-
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote="!Joshua, post:12, topic:309014"][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=405470.msg2998782#msg2998782 date=1255806511]

i dotn got answer but guys stop argueing and try answer your just spamming this thread now

like your stupid retarded post isnt flaming this thread
[/quote]
I’ve noticed you do this multiple times, you can’t just go around flaming and expect no punishment. Please stop.

@Topic: You should just create a system in your server which flags players receiving mass amounts of valuble items, and then make it warn them fif they’re flagged, log them into a txt document and monitor them. If you already have a system and 100+ people are duping, then this is when i suggest you FIX THOSE FLAWS.[/quote]

your not my mom you nerd

Read full topic

item.title: -317- Dupers -317-

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:1, topic:309164”][quote author=coocoobanana link=topic=405470.msg2998778#msg2998778 date=1255806364]
i dotn got answer but guys stop argueing and try answer your just spamming this thread now
[/quote]

like your stupid retarded post isnt flaming this thread[/quote]
I’ve noticed you do this multiple times, you can’t just go around flaming and expect no punishment. Please stop.

@Topic: You should just create a system in your server which flags players receiving mass amounts of valuble items, and then make it warn them fif they’re flagged, log them into a txt document and monitor them. If you already have a system and 100+ people are duping, then this is when i suggest you FIX THOSE FLAWS.

item.title: -317- Dupers -317-
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

my server does the same thing. every person basically gets put in there from doing skills and stuff, it depends on how your server is set out…
if people do alot of skilling and mass amounts of item are being put into their inventory automatically,
theyre gonna be flagged as dupers.
i got flagged on my own server
nothing to worry about,
it’s only if they have 999m of every item they own. thats when you should take action

Read full topic
